profile:
I'm the type of engineer who runs Linux natively on their laptop and desktop. \
      A fun Saturday for me is building a home server or building my own Cloud system. \
      I'm a tech enthusiast who enjoys learning new things and I have a passion for creating and problem-solving. \
      I have a strong background in software engineering and I am always looking for new challenges to tackle. \
      With me, you be getting an engineer with years of experience and a top-tier AI expert. \
      With nearly a decade of experience, I possess a diverse set of skills, \
      and I'm always eager to learn and expand my skill set.
